item.title: RMarkdown (.Rmd) to MS Word (.docx) aka rmarkdown2docx
item.description: Love Rmarkdown (.Rmd) but hate that you sometimes have to produce MS Word (.docx) files? BOOM! Solved. This post shows you how. Well, it sources the repo I made that shows you how!
